dct_title_s: Pascaerte van NOVA GRANADA, en t'Eylandt CALIFORNIA
dct_description_sm: California as an island on second Sanson model. Agubela de Cato, Straet Anian, and Terra Incognita [or] Onbekent Landt to north. Nearly identical with Goos' map of same title, but location of some place names differ.
Title cartouche (upper right) with cherub and ornamental decoration.
Text describing California below title cartouche.
Multiple scales given within cartouche flanked by 3 cherubs (bottom left).
Issued in: Klaer-lichtende noort-star ofte Zee-Atlas / By Joannes van Loon, 1666. Reissued in 1668.
By Ioh. van Loon Plaetsnyder, en Ioh. van Waesberge.
